articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Apple now lets you move purchases between your 25 years of accounts - Ars Technica
articles.description: Now we can all bring that mandatory U2 album back into our main libraries.

articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Adobe launches subscriptions for Firefly AI - TechCrunch
articles.description: Firefly's Standard plan costs $9.99 per month, the Pro plan will run users $29.99 a month, and there's a more extensive Premium tier in the works.
articles.content: Adobe is hoping to capitalize on the early success of its Firefly AI models by launching a new standalone subscription service that gives users access to the company’s AI image, vector and video gene… [+4106 chars]
